entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
